What is AutoBoot Addon?
- AutoBoot Monitor your VPS for 24x7 Hours and If your VPS goes down then our AutoBoot will automatically start your VPS. For example If you are sleeping and your VPS goes down due to attack or software,etc error then our AutoBoot addon will automatically start your VPS and save you from unexpected/unwanted downtime.

- AutoBoot gives you a peace of mind and you can sleep at night without worrying about unexpected downtime.


AutoBoot: Optional



Thanks.
